Detailed Description

Parses collada controller libraries. Specifically, it takes collada "<skin>s" and applies vertex weights to ogre meshes. It also transforms all vertices of a mesh according to the bind shape matrix.
Author:
Michael Weyel

Member Function Documentation

int CControllerConverter::convert ( daeDatabase *  pDatabase  )  [virtual]

Reads collada "<skin>s" and applies vertex weights to ogre meshes. It also transforms all vertices of a mesh according to the bind shape matrix, if present. Meshes already have to have been created and stored as Ogre resources, so if you directly call this function (rather than calling CColladaDatabase::convertResources()), make sure to call CGeometryConverter::convert() first.

Parameters:
pDatabase daeDatabase to convert controllers from
Returns:
0 if succeeded, 1 upon error, prints error message to stderr

! Ogre doens't update the bouding box with skeletal animation. Have to think of something if it becomes neccessary.
